list_definition.definition: (of a face or voice) showing no feeling

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: He spoke in a cold, expressionless tone.

list_ex_of_english: Indeed, he often appears bored during trial; an expressionless look with his head resting in his hands.
Some advocated performing with a mask, others performing with an expressionless or mask-like face.
Some limitations of this study include the reliance on expressionless performances.
Solrock, apparently a meteorite whose origins appear to be from outer space, is expressionless, yet is somewhat sentient.
They have the ability to remain completely still, expressionless and silent.
To me, there is something infinitely moving about the expressionless mask which our phlegmatic countrymen and women wear as they sit in an outpatients' department.
The children have chilled expressionless stares, although the youngest child seems to be on the verge of smiling.
Another typical feature is the expressionless faces of the sleepy-eyed people, turned to the left or right while their bodies face the front.
